1148275985432735744.text: Glad my folks didn't have Twitter when I came out to them as gay in highschool so they could say they "lost their son." In the '70s, homosexuality was still considered a mental disorder for which you could be forcibly institutionalized. But they eventually accepted me as I am.https://twitter.com/ShireenQudosi/status/1139023857912729601 …

1148276594588430336.text:
Did I just read something like “Unless you’re a parent of an autistic child or even just a parent you don’t have skin in the game so stfu?”

Pretty sure autistic people themselves have plenty of skin in the game, along with people who depend on heard immunity for survival etc.

1148282870450065409.text: There's a little battle about why "Complete Elimination of Autistic Spectrum Expression" therapy is as offensive to #autistic people as conversion therapy is to LGBT community. It's lost on many.

1148276867155288064.text: In addition to her nonsense about vaccines, the worst part of this tweet is she doesn’t understand autism at all. Nor do most of these people hoping for “a cure”. It’s just a different way of processing sensory information. Not a death sentence.

1148417629129969664.text: Whoever it is must be a real prize; I’m already blocked from seeing their tweets. :D
1148417629129969664.user_name: head in the clouds, ass in the chair

1148556768580161538.text: I effectively lost my father the year my parents split up. Same year I got the oral polio vaccine. Curse you Albert Sabin for costing me my dad!

1148435553018363904.text:
Goddammit and also, goddammit. 

#Autistic ppl have validated MY life as a neurotypical. BC seeing the world differently is a privilege, burden and life task. Autistic ppl gave me science fiction. Gave me alternate views. F ck seeing them as problems. As my parents saw me.

1148294748064681984.text: Interesting Steve. It's the same structural underlying issue. I would have hoped your parents would have wanted you to have the choice, if you wanted it.

1148486842163105793.text: This is why researchers and people get away with saying dehumanizing things, because sometimes not even parents see their kids as human. I'm so done with it.

1148513073755566080.text: The *worst part* is that she has an autistic child - imagine what their life must be like...

1148369311251271681.text: ABA and conversion therepy created at the same time- its about reprograming a person to not be who they are.

1148459537600516096.text: You're better off. Their feed is full of hateful BS for just about everyone.
